title: Vegetable Noodle Stir Fry
ingredients: ['225g uncooked spaghetti', '4 tablespoons vegetable oil', '150g fresh sliced mushrooms', '110g grated carrots', '50g sliced red peppers', '1 onion, chopped', '2 cloves garlic, finely chopped', '215g fresh beansprouts', '50g chopped spring onions', '1 tablespoon cornflour', '250ml chicken stock', '4 tablespoons hoisin sauce', '2 tablespoons honey', '1 tablespoon soy sauce', '1 teaspoon grated fresh ginger', '1/4 teaspoon cayenne pepper', '1/4 teaspoon curry powder']
